directions: In a bowl mash beans to break the surface and blend. Add yogurt, tomatoes, arugula, olives, salt and pepper, mix well, let dip stand 20 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can white beans, drained and rinsed
1 cup Dannon Oikos Plain Greek Nonfat Yogurt
Salt and cracked pepper to taste
title: Tuscany Harvest Dip
